name: parkplatz
description: - [NodeJS http-server](https://www.npmjs.com/package/http-server)   - Installation `npm install http-server -g`   - tasks.json: `http-server server/public -p 8081`   - -p und 8081 für die gewünschte Portnummer   - Tutorial: [Einfacher File Server mit Node.js](https://stackoverflow.com/questions/16333790/node-js-quick-file-server-static-files-over-http) - [NodeJS pouchdb](https://www.npmjs.com/package/pouchdb) - [NodeJS pouchdb-server](https://www.npmjs.com/package/pouchdb-server)   - task.json: `pouchdb-server --port 3000 --dir output/database`   - [Install pouchdb for node and typescript](https://pouchdb.com/guides/setup-pouchdb.html):     - `npm install pouchdb @types/pouchdb`   - [Install pouch db server for node](https://github.com/pouchdb/pouchdb-server#readme):     - `npm install -g pouchdb-server` There is a [pouchdb admin ui](http://127.0.0.1:3000/_utils) for your browser.
